game.name: Dark Lord Verkins
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Queen Verkins is the dragon queen and one of the three rulers of the underworld. Queen Galzra is the grim reaper queen and also is a ruler. Explore the story and lore about Verkins, ruler of dragons. This is a romantic love story between these two in this short romance visual novel.
